SALES STATUS: It is important to keep your prospect's "Sales Status" up-to-date by selecting current status from the list. Ultimately selecting "Closed" will move them to Customer Management.

AGREED UPON NEXT STEP: Increase your efficency! All entries will appear on your calendar and send you a reminder. Use for every step of the sales/prospecting process. If there is no agreed upon next step, then the prospect is temporarily stalled and should be moved to the "Fallback Status". Provide the corresponding milestone date below if applicable.
MILESTONE DATES: Provide the following dates to track when the prospect has completed the following milestones for each applicable status.
on
Entered into the System
Temporarily Stalled
Successfully Completed Deal
Lost Deal

AUTO CHANGE STATUS: The current sales step may designate an automatic status change at a specific time, and/or an automatic email to be sent at a specific time. You may also specify a specific status and date/time to be changed, if necessary.
